Package draughts

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    An interface to get the Move from a Player.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Draughts
    A class to start a new game of English Draughts.
    DraughtsModel
    A class that represents a game of Draughts.
    InputPDA
    A class to act as a DPDA to work out when there is enough information for a move.
    Move
    A class to represent a Move in the game.
    Piece
    A class to represent a Piece in the game.
    SaveGame
    A class to save and load games.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Colour
    An enum to represent the two Colours a Piece can take.
